rooms.name: Open Living & Dining Area

rooms.name: Chef's Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern yet bohemian kitchen with an open layout and energy-efficient appliances.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area, offering ample space for a Bohemian styled dining set-up.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Quiet workspace optimized for concentration with natural lighting and minimal distractions.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious bedroom featuring soft Bohemian decor, ample closet space and serene ambiance.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable room with a Bohemian twist for occasional visitors.

openings.description: Large entryway ensuring Vastu alignment and ease of access.
Access to the garden area, enhancing natural ventilation and sunlight flow.
